name: InCuca
description:
InCuca is an IT company specialized in providing Tailored Solutions and developing high quality customized websites.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Based in Florianópolis, also known as the Brazilian Silicon Valley, our team of developers and designers are trained to provide the solution that best suits you: this includes developing, managing, or maintaining your Blogs, Mobile Apps, Softwares, and E-shops. Our work is to facilitate and systematize your processes in order to allow you to focus on what you do the best!
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
We work hard to make the internet a friendlier place, that’s why we do not only care about our clients but also about our final users. In order to achieve this goal, we will get as close as possible to your needs.
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
Our services include:
Front-end, Back-end and Full Stack Web development and Integration
E-commerce with WooCommerce
SEO
Web application
Mobile Application Development
Custom Software Services and IT consulting
UX/UI Design Development
Blog Development & Improvements
Hosting & Maintenance
